sections.heading: Sheriff's office merit commission; created; county having 25,000 inhabitants or more
sections.text: In any county having a population of twenty-five thousand inhabitants or more, there shall be a sheriff's office merit commission.SourceLaws 1969, c. 140, ยง 2, p. 642;Laws 1972, LB 1093, ยง 2;Laws 1975, LB 315, ยง 2;L
